sentence.Network_en: the transitory nature of his happiness
In the final analysis, most of life's joys are transitory.
sentence.Network_cn: 归根结底, 尘世间的欢乐大多是过眼烟云,转瞬即逝.
绝大多数青少年的恋情都转瞬即逝。

transitivity 过渡性transitory 暂时的transitory phase 暂时相
transitive 传递的，过渡的transitory 短暂的，瞬变的translation 翻译，变换
GRE重点词汇统计abate - 豆丁网 ... divert:v. 使转向，转移，使（河流）改道 transitory:a. 短暂的，片刻的，昙花一现的，无常的.

list.abs: transitory stage 过渡阶段transitory starch 暂时淀粉transketolase 酮糖移转酶
暂时收入(transitory income)是指一时的、不稳定的、带有偶然性的收入。相应地,消费者的消费等于持久消费与暂时消费之和。其中, 暂时消费指间或的、偶然性消费支出.
1. transitron oscillator circuittransitory income 不定收入, 暂时收入transit-time error 渡越时间误差
transitional moor 过度沼泽transitory stage 过渡阶段transitory starch 暂时淀粉
transitory 暂时的transitory phase 暂时相translate 翻译

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French transitoire, from Christian Latin transitorius, from transit- 'gone across' (see transit)

entry.tran: 短暂的;转瞬即逝的;昙花一现的
entry.def: If you say that something is transitory, you mean that it lasts only for a short time.

example.tran: 绝大多数十几岁少年的恋情都转瞬即逝。

example.ex: …a sad reminder of the transitory nature of political success.
example.tran: 不由得令人悲哀地想到政治成功昙花一现的本质

sentences.sentence: "love is transitory but at is eternal"

auth_sentence.content: The hedgerow Is blanched...with transitory blossom Of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hedgerow Is blanched...with transitory blossom Of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hedgerow Is blanched...with transitory blossom Of snow.

auth_sentence.content: The transitory more and more becomes one with the beautiful.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The transitory more and more becomes one with the beautiful.

auth_sentence.content: His explanations have invariably emphasised the transitory nature of the problem.
auth_sentence.res_content: His explanations have invariably emphasised the transitory nature of the problem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His explanations have invariably emphasised the transitory nature of the problem.
